item.title: 高盛预计大宗商品将推动南非交易浪潮
item.description: 高盛集团预计，随着非洲最大经济体南非开始受益于结构性改革并乘上大宗商品繁荣的浪潮，该国今年将迎来繁忙的交易年。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. expects a busy year of deals for South Africa as the continent’s largest economy starts to benefit from structural reforms and rides a commodities-boom wave.】

item.title: 摩根大通看涨预测推动两只中国人工智能股大涨
item.description: 摩根大通公司建议投资者买入新兴人工智能模型开发商的股票后，MiniMax集团和知识地图技术股份有限公司在香港股市大幅上涨。【原文：MiniMax Group Inc. and Knowledge Atlas Technology JSC Ltd. surged in Hong Kong after JPMorgan Chase & Co. recommended investors buy the emerging artificial intelligence model developers’ stocks.】

item.title: 内华达州超级碗投注额骤降近12%至1.34亿美元
item.description: 内华达州博彩监管委员会周一公布的数据显示，该州2月8日超级碗赛事的投注总额较上年同期下降11.7%，至1.338亿美元。【原文：Total wagers placed in Nevada on the Feb. 8 Super Bowl fell 11.7% to $133.8 million from the prior year, according to data released Monday by the state’s Gaming Control Board.】

item.title: 铜价维持涨势，因中国假期前涨势停滞
item.description: 铜和铝维持涨势，此前由中国买盘推动的涨势因该国临近重大节假日而停滞。【原文：Copper and aluminum held gains as a rally, which had been supercharged by Chinese buying, stalled while the country approached a major holiday period.】

item.title: 澳大利亚矿商PLS在锂供应协议中锁定最低价格
item.description: PLS集团有限公司已与Canmax科技公司签署锂金属包销协议，成为首家获得电池金属最低价格保障供应协议的澳大利亚矿业公司。【原文：PLS Group Ltd. has signed a lithium offtake agreement with Canmax Technologies Co., becoming the first Australian miner to secure a supply deal that guarantees a minimum price for the battery metal.】

item.title: 尽管全球市场波动，马来西亚国库控股净资产仍增长1%
item.description: 马来西亚主权财富基金国库控股表示，尽管全球市场波动加剧，其2025年净资产仍较上年增长近1%。【原文：Malaysian sovereign wealth fund Khazanah Nasional said its net assets grew by nearly 1% in 2025 from the previous year despite heightened global volatility.】

item.title: 阿达尼能源公司获得由日本银行牵头的7.5亿美元贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由印度亿万富翁高塔姆·阿达尼控股的阿达尼能源解决方案公司已获得由两家日本银行牵头的7.5亿美元贷款，这再次表明日本贷款机构对印度的兴趣日益浓厚。【原文：Adani Energy Solutions Ltd., controlled by Indian billionaire Gautam Adani, secured a $750 million loan led by two Japanese banks, according to people familiar with the matter, in the latest sign of Japanese lenders’ surging interest in India.】

item.title: Citadel证券聘请Smerin担任结构化产品主管
item.description: 知情人士透露，肯·格里芬旗下的城堡证券聘请摩根士丹利的理查德·斯梅林担任全球结构化产品主管，这是该公司近期在亚洲地区进行的一系列关键人才引进中的最新举措。【原文：Ken Griffin’s Citadel Securities hired Morgan Stanley’s Richard Smerin as global head of structured products, the latest of a string of key Asia-based recruits, said a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 大选后外资购入泰国股票创四年新高
item.description: 随着现任为泰党在周日选举中取得压倒性胜利，为政策延续铺平道路，全球资金再度涌入泰国股市。【原文：Global funds piled back into Thai equities as a convincing win by incumbent Bhumjaithai Party in Sunday’s election paved the way for policy continuity.】

item.title: 拟上市的印度国家证券交易所称交易商寻求印度证券交易税上调宽限
item.description: 市场参与者已向政府提出申诉，要求其重新审议该决定。【原文：Market participants have made a representation to the government to review its decision.】

item.title: 翻筋斗机器人视频助推现代汽车股价上涨
item.description: 现代汽车公司股价上涨，此前其机器人部门发布视频展示Atlas人形机器人完成侧手翻和后空翻动作，凸显其灵巧度与逼真动作。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. shares rose after the automaker’s robotics unit released a video showing its Atlas humanoid robot executing a cartwheel and backflip, highlighting its dexterity and lifelike movement.】

item.title: 澳大利亚因儿童诱骗报告加大对Roblox的施压力度
item.description: 澳大利亚政府加大对Roblox公司的施压力度，要求其高管就相关报道作出说明。这些报道称，该游戏平台上竟有年仅四岁的儿童遭到性诱骗。【原文：Australia’s government ramped up pressure on Roblox Corp., summoning executives to explain reports that have alleged children as young as four years old have been sexually groomed on the gaming service.】

item.title: 因印尼限产，中国今年或将提高煤炭产量
item.description: 中国煤炭行业主要机构预计，今年煤炭进口量将下降，国内产量可能上升。此前印尼采取限制出口措施以提振价格。【原文：China’s main coal industry body sees a drop in imports this year and potentially higher domestic production after Indonesia moved to restrict shipments in an attempt to boost prices.】

item.title: 人民币兑美元汇率创2023年以来新高，美元因美国国债报告承压
item.description: 人民币汇率飙升至2023年5月以来的最高水平，此前有消息称中国要求银行限制持有美国国债。【原文：The yuan surged to its strongest level since May 2023 after China was said to have asked banks to limit their holdings of US Treasuries.】

item.title: 中国加强石油化工、铜业及航空业碳排放报告要求
item.description: 中国生态环境部要求石化厂、铜冶炼厂、航空公司等重污染企业上报排放数据，这是扩大全国碳市场的重要一步。【原文：The Chinese environment ministry has asked petrochemicals plants, copper smelters, airlines and other heavy polluters to report their emissions, a key step to expanding the nation’s carbon market.】

item.title: 富时罗素与明晟同步暂停印尼股票指数评估
item.description: 富时罗素成为最新一家对印尼投资可行性提出担忧的指数供应商，此前MSCI公司上月发布的警告已重创该国市场。【原文：FTSE Russell became the latest index provider to raise concerns over the investability of Indonesia, following warnings from MSCI Inc. that dealt a heavy blow to the market last month.】

item.title: 高市早苗或胜安倍 吸引全球资金涌入日本股市
item.description: 随着自民党在选举中取得压倒性胜利，外国资金流入日本股市的势头有望加速。分析师预测未来数月买盘规模可能激增五倍，甚至可能超过安倍时代的水准。【原文：The flow of foreign funds into Japanese stocks is poised to accelerate after the Liberal Democratic Party’s landslide election, with analysts forecasting as much as a five-fold rise in buying over the next few months, possibly surpassing levels seen during the Abe era.】

item.title: 量化管理公司Qube将中国基金规模扩大十倍，突破20亿美元大关
item.description: 量化对冲基金巨头Qube Research & Technologies旗下中国多头股票基金的资产规模在过去一年增长了十倍以上，随着更多全球投资者对亚洲最大市场产生兴趣。【原文：Quantitative hedge fund giant Qube Research & Technologies grew assets in its China long-only equity fund more than 10-fold over the past year, as more global investors warmed to Asia’s largest market.】

item.title: 无人机公司EOS股价剧烈波动，做空机构回应引发震荡
item.description: 澳大利亚国防公司Electro Optic Systems Holdings Ltd.的股价出现波动，此前该公司回应了Grizzly Research的做空报告。【原文：Electro Optic Systems Holdings Ltd. shares swung after the Australian defense company responded to a short-seller report from Grizzly Research.】

item.title: 瑞银首席基金经理称亚洲垃圾债涨势仍有空间
item.description: 一位顶级区域投资者表示，亚洲垃圾债今年有望再度反弹，并延续其相对于美国同类债券的优异表现，因为较低的杠杆率有效控制了违约风险。【原文：Asian junk bonds are poised to rally again this year and extend their outperformance over US peers, as lower leverage keeps default risks in check, according to a top regional investor.】

item.title: 英国智库称工作"不再是摆脱贫困的途径"
item.description: 根据决议基金会的研究，英国典型低收入家庭需要等待137年才能实现生活水平翻番——这一周期比过去延长了三倍以上。【原文：A typical lower-income British household would have to wait 137 years to see its living standards double, according to the Resolution Foundation — more than three times longer than in the past.】

item.title: 斯塔默正引领一场经济复苏，但他可能无缘享受其成果
item.description: 对首相基尔·斯塔默而言，眼下形势本该一片大好——年初时他还恳求不满的公众以他扭转英国经济的能力来评判自己。【原文：Things ought to be looking rosy for Prime Minister Keir Starmer, who began the year begging a dissatisfied public to judge him on his ability to turn around the UK economy.】

item.title: 马来西亚反贪污委员会主席在舆论哗然后重返股市
item.description: 马来西亚反贪污委员会主席阿扎姆·巴基持有某金融服务公司数百万股股份，公司文件显示。这是他数年前因持股问题引发轩然大波、抗议者要求其下台以来，首次公开披露其名下的大额股权。【原文：Malaysian anti-corruption chief Azam Baki held millions of shares in a financial-services company, a corporate filing shows, the first public disclosure of a major stake in his name since an uproar over his shareholdings several years ago spurred protests calling for him to step down.】

item.title: 新加坡预计2026年GDP增速可达4%，得益于全球经济强劲复苏
item.description: 新加坡预测今年经济增速将超预期，因全球贸易活动保持韧性。【原文：Singapore forecast its economy will expand faster than expected this year as global trade activity remains resilient.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉加大美元抛售力度以支撑玻利瓦尔汇率
item.description: 委内瑞拉临时政府正通过私营银行出售更多美元，作为在政治动荡中维持货币稳定的持续努力的一部分。【原文：Venezuela’s interim government is selling more dollars through private banks as part of an ongoing effort to keep the currency stable amid political uncertainty.】

item.title: 内存芯片短缺引发市场动荡，且影响将持续扩大
item.description: 过去几个月内存芯片价格的持续飙升，在股市中催生了赢家与输家的巨大鸿沟，而投资者们尚未看到这场涨势的终结迹象。【原文：The relentless surge in memory chip prices over the past few months has driven a vast divide between winners and losers in the stock market, and investors don’t see any end in sight.】

item.title: 金价回落，市场波动持续，此前经历历史性暴跌
item.description: 黄金在连续两日上涨后回落，投资者在震荡市场中获利了结。此前黄金遭遇历史性暴跌，市场仍在试图寻找底部支撑。【原文：Gold fell after two days of gains, as investors took profits in a choppy market that’s still trying to find a floor following a historic rout.】

item.title: 油价延续两日涨势，交易员聚焦中东风险
item.description: 油价延续两日涨势，因中东局势紧张——尤其是石油输出国组织成员国伊朗的动荡——为油价增添了风险溢价。【原文：Oil held a two-day advance as tensions in the Middle East centered on OPEC member Iran added a risk premium to prices.】

item.title: 澳大利亚消费者信心指数在澳联储加息后下滑
item.description: 澳大利亚消费者信心指数在2月份下滑，此前该国央行成为今年首个上调基准利率的主要货币当局，旨在抑制顽固的通胀。【原文：Australia’s consumer sentiment slipped in February after the Reserve Bank became the first major monetary authority to hike its key interest rate this year in an effort to tame stubbornly strong inflation.】

item.title: 米兰称美联储决策者应在危机中运用资产负债表
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬·米兰表示，央行资产负债表需要缩减规模，但这不应阻止决策者在经济危机期间选择大规模资产购买。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said the central bank’s balance sheet needs to be smaller, but that shouldn’t preclude policymakers from opting for large-scale asset purchases during an economic crisis.】
